PersonalStatement.text: Kendra Roy, born on 1976-06-28, is a Female based in West Michaelmouth, Timor-Leste. She is Divorced and holds Sri Lankan nationality. Currently working at Calderon PLC.

WorkExperience.text: HR Manager at Melton and Sons from 2007 to 2019.
Senior Research Scientist at Calderon PLC, 2019 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Marketing from Jordan University of Science & Technology
Master's in Engineering from Université Claude Bernard Lyon 1

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.
Leadership: Proven track record of managing cross-functional teams.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys woodworking.
